Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:



Demon Wulf stepped up behind Reptilica, his sword at the ready.  "Contact 
your leader.  Inform him we are coming in."

Flesh Ripper and Dark Claw both stepped out of the ship.  Flesh Ripper kept 
his rifle ready, Dark Claw energized a ball of destructive energy in his palm.
